member.name: M:PrimeTools.Calculations.GCD(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Calculates the greatest common divisor between two numbers using the Euclidean Algorithm.

member.name: M:PrimeTools.Calculations.LinearCombination(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32@,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Solves ax + by = gcd(a, b). Stores the x and y result in the variables x and y.
